entry.title: Hanneke Kappen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Dutch radio and TV presenter Hanneke Kappen (pictured) presented the second Dutch radio show dedicated to heavy metal music?

entry.title: serpent seed (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the fringe belief of serpent seed claims that the Serpent mated with Eve in the Garden of Eden, and their offspring was Cain?

entry.title: Angelo Tsarouchas (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Angelo Tsarouchas nearly abandoned his hopes of being a comedian because his wife at the time thought it was a bad idea?

entry.title: The Untold Story of Emmett Louis Till (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the 2005 documentary The Untold Story of Emmett Louis Till, about African-American teenager Emmett Till's murder in 1955 for whistling at a white woman, contributed to the case being reopened?

entry.title: Impossible Rebellion (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that some protesters in the 2021 London Impossible Rebellion dressed as bankers with blood on their hands?

entry.title: Viola Roseboro' (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that after Viola Roseboro' suggested Willa Cather rewrite My Ántonia completely, Cather may have based the novel My Mortal Enemy on her?

entry.title: Socialist Youth League (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a Socialist Youth League candidate in the 1990 Bosnian general election registered his ethnicity as 'Eskimo' as an apparent protest against ethnic registry requirements for candidates?

entry.title: Omas gegen Rechts (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the protest initiative Omas gegen Rechts (Grannies against the Right) was awarded a prize for civil courage by the Central Council of Jews in Germany?

entry.title: 严防！一返校大学生核酸异常 (快科技)

entry.title: 26万人连夜紧急核酸检测：有结果了！ (快科技)

entry.title: 北大要求“福建北大”更名 对方回应：我们有合法授权 (快科技)

entry.title: 法兰西最丑的美男子：法国传奇演员去世 (快科技)
entry.content: 据外媒报道，法国电影演员、动作片演员让-保罗·贝尔蒙多不幸去世，享年88岁。 让-保罗·贝尔蒙多，法语Jean-Paul Belmondo，又译杨波·贝蒙，1933年4月9日出生于法国塞纳河
